title: Chicken Curry
directions: Heat a spoonful of oil in a large shallow pan and fry off onions and garlic until softened.
Add cooked chicken and curry paste – stir well to coat chicken in the curry paste.
Add the passata and a little splash of stock.
Bring to the boil. Spoon into a large ovenproof dish and place in a preheated oven Gas 4-5 180C 350F and cook for about 30 minutes until thoroughly heated through and piping hot.
Remove from oven – drizzle with olive oil and scatter with coriander leaves.
Serve with halved baked jacket potatoes, yogurt & mango chutney.
